title: JavaScript / TypeScript
description:
JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight interpreted (or just-in-time compiled) programming language with first-class functions. 
TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

libraries.libraryDescription: A modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance & extras
Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates and times in JavaScript
Is a minimalist JavaScript library that parses, validates, manipulates, and displays dates and times for modern browsers with a largely Moment.js-compatible API
Is a JavaScript library that provides a whole mess of useful functional programming helpers without extending any built-in objects
